doc.title: Photographing a Goose
doc.plot: A farmer takes a prize goose to the photographer, and while the artist shows the hayseed what his goose looks like through the camera a tramp enters, hangs his cap on the lens and runs off with the goose. When the "Rube" finds his bird gone he accuses the photographer and they engage in a fight. The wind-up shows the farmer jamming the camera down over the head of the photographer, with his head protruding. This is a funny subject.
